file_content.text: Sorry to trouble you, Master Jedi... but when it comes to Sith Lords, seems we're pretty useless on our own.
It's all right, Tefani. I'm a soldier, and this is how soldiers go--even semi-retired ones.
You're going to make it, Captain. Just lie still and let Doctor Kantos help you.
We're not letting you die.
Do you know why Legius's men attacked you? What did they want?
Tell me what happened.
We don't have time for last words. I need to know where Darth Legius went.
We're wasting time.
The man just told you he's dying, and all you care about is finding Legius?
They took the planetary shield codes for the New Uphrades evacuation colony. Guess the civs here are lucky they missed the boat.
Every civilian we've saved is in that colony now. Legius wants to make another statement.
Legius wants attention.
Why is there a shield around the colony? And how did we end up with the codes?
What shield codes?
When the Supreme Chancellor hears, she'll send the entire fleet to the colony. Legius won't get within fifty parsecs.
He's got no chance.
Get this intel to Republic command. Maybe they can evacuate New Uphrades before Legius gets there.
Alert the authorities.
There are millions of innocent people on New Uphrades. Aren't you the least bit worried about them?
Morale? Seriously?
Legius is one Sith, with one army, and no support from the Empire. He can't destroy New Uphrades by himself.
You overestimate him.
I'll contact the Supreme Chancellor's office. Single cruiser like yours can reach Legius a lot faster than the fleet, so say your goodbyes now.
You turned from war and chose a life of peace. I can't promise I'll never fight again--but I intend to try.
I'll honor your memory.
There will always be men like Legius. If I don't stop them, who will?
It's not that simple.
Legius has destroyed countless lives. Killing him won't be enough. Killing his men won't be enough.
The Empire must pay.
The Imps had him cornered. He held them off for a while, but when the shock troops got in....
His internal injuries are too severe. If the Imperials hadn't destroyed half my supplies....
You don't have to answer, Captain. I can give you a sedative if you're in pain.
Never mind, Audra. If I have to die... I'm going to die useful.
They came in hot. Perimeter guards were dead before they could sound the alarm. We got the civs behind forcefields just in time.
Once the Imps were in, they went for the computers. Sliced past our security, uploaded something to Legius. Didn't see what, but I have an idea....
Like what? "I've lost my mind?"
State-of-the-art protection for the Supreme Chancellor's pride and joy. We had the codes so we could send refugees there.
New Uphrades has plenty of defenses besides the shield. Legius will never get past them before a Republic fleet arrives.
Darth Legius = lost Project Sever // Darth Legius = expects to die?
The Dark Council wants Legius dead anyway. Maybe he wants to go out with a bang.
The Dark Council's gonna kill him anyway, right?
The Dark Council wants Legius dead. He's got nothing to lose now.
Legius failed to recover Project Sever. His life is forfeit regardless.
Speculation: Legius has been condemned by the Dark Council. Self-termination may be a preferable alternative.
I would rather be deactivated by the Republic than the Dark Council, master. Perhaps Darth Legius had the same thought?
You said the Jedi got Project Sever... if that's true, Legius is done for anyway.
If he's planning a suicide run... he could bombard the colony until he's out of torpedos, transfer life support to his ship's engines....
The big picture's my job. Saving lives is theirs.
Even if he's willing to die trying?
That's all you can do. All any of us can....
It's your life, master Jedi. Not theirs....
But where does it end? Where does it....
The... body?
Better get moving. Supreme Chancellor wants you in the air and on Legius's tail. Master Satele will be leading reinforcements.
They'll need us on New Uphrades if things go wrong. Let's get the body in cryo and the civilians to a safe location.
We'll move out with the fleet. When you find Legius, I hope he gets everything that's coming to him.
He's already got a head start. If Legius destroys New Uphrades, it would be the biggest blow to morale since the Sacking of Coruscant.
The Jedi have such power. To waste it on more death... you're better than that.
Look at all we've done together. Serving the Republic, doing your duty... doesn't have to mean war.
Don't grow old fighting battles, like I did. After Legius is gone... let him be the last.
